name: io.github.religa/multi-mcp
title: Multi-MCP
description: Parallel multi model code review, security analysis and AI debate with ChatGPT, Claude and Gemini.

environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: OpenAI API key for GPT models (optional - at least one provider required)

environmentVariables.name: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Anthropic API key for Claude models (optional - at least one provider required)

environmentVariables.name: GEMINI_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Google API key for Gemini models (optional - at least one provider required)

environmentVariables.name: OPENROUTER_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: OpenRouter API key for additional models (optional)

environmentVariables.name: DEFAULT_MODEL
environmentVariables.description: Default model to use (defaults to gpt-5-mini)

environmentVariables.name: DEFAULT_MODEL_LIST
environmentVariables.description: Default models for multi-model comparison (comma-separated, defaults to gpt-5-mini,gemini-3-flash)
